title: "Jump" by Cadwell Turnbull
description: An ordinary couple experiences an extraordinary event during a walk in the park. "Jump" was first published in LIGHTSPEED MAGAZINE. Cadwell Turnbull's debut novel is THE LESSON.
author: originals+lbr@stitcher.com (LeVar Burton and Stitcher)
